title: Ashley Graham's strapless bra hack for gals with big boobs is genius
text:
From Cosmopolitan

After posing in her underwear for the past 15-years, it’s no surprise that Ashley Graham knows a thing or two about finding the right bra.

And in true model fashion, Ashley's passing on her knowledge in a sizzling new photo on Instagram, giving girls with bigger busts the world over the ultimate inside-hack, from her years of experience working with some of the biggest lingerie giants in the industry.

While the image seems to have been taken pre-pregnancy, the 31-year-old lets her natural beauty shine with little to no makeup and tousled waves, while posing in a black strapless bra and high-waisted briefs from plus-sized clothing company Additionelle.

Ashley’s pro tip for finding the best strapless bra if you’re part of the #BigBoobsClub is surprisingly simple, telling her 9.2 million followers: “The trick to a strapless bra if you’re over a DD cup is keeping your cup size the same but going down a size in the band (RN I’m a 38DDD so I wear a 36DDD for my strapless bras to keep the girls up).”

Her followers were clearly impressed with the advice, with fans commenting:

Thank you for the tip! I always shy away from strapless or spaghetti-strap items for that exact reason!

Thank you for the tip because I'm a DD girl and I couldn't keep them up for the life of me.

This is my body!!! Even same bra size!!! Thank you queen for representing for me 💕

But this isn’t the first time fans have thanked the Nebraska-born-beauty for her genius life-hacks. In July 2017 Ashley shed light on how to create a perfect-fitting bikini top that relieves pressure off your neck. Inspired by body-positive advocate Allison Kimmey, Ashley re-tied the straps of her Swimsuits for All bikini to create a straight spaghetti style back, giving up-graded support. #Genius

Photo credit: @ashleygraham - Instagram More

2019's been an exciting year for Ashley, who announced she was expecting her first child with husband of nine years Justin Hervin in August and has since been an inspiration for pregnant women everywhere, getting candid on stretch marks, working out, basking in that “mama glow” and learning to embrace her changing body, curves and all.

In a recent Instagram post, Ashley revealed she was struggling to accept her new pregnancy body, saying: “Getting bigger and bigger and trying to embrace my new body every day. It’s a journey and I’m so thankful to have such a supportive community🤰🏻🤰🏻🤰🏻”.

That community rallied round Ashley with celebs coming out in support, from Jessica Alba saying, “Love ❤️ so much!” and fellow model Karlie Kloss commenting, “You look BEAUTIFUL 👑❤️😍” and another fan saying, “Welcome to the momma club... we wear our tiger stripes proudly ❤️”.

While this isn’t the first pro tip Ashley’s given fans, one thing’s for sure, this soon-to-be mama will no doubt continue to spread the love and knowledge on to her fans, here's hoping for a life hack #MamaEdition, am I right?
